//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;

//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//

// Registers:
//
//   Name                    Reg   Size
//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   UniformPixelVector_0    c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio          c2       1

//   UniformPixelScalars_0   c11      1
//   LightFunctionParameters c12      1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0        s2       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1        s3       1
//   PixelTexture2D_2        s4       1
//   PixelTexture2D_3        s5       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.5, 0.100000001, 0.0714285746, 0.0666666701
    def c6, 10, 14, -1, 1
    def c13, 1.5, 0.107142858, 15, 0.333000004
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-lights --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_2966A095_34907078.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r31, c220.z, s15
mov r6.xyw, v0
add r31.w, r6.w, -r31.y
mad r6.x, r31.w, r31.x, r6.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r6.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r6.x
      mov r1.yz, r6.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r6.xyww, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r6.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, r6.xxyw
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r0
    mul r1.xyz, r0.z, c8.xyww

// Unreal Engine light fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-lights --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_2966A095_34907078.txt
add r31.w, r0.x, -r31.y
mad r0.y, -r31.w, r31.x, r0.y

    mad r0.yzw, c7.xxyw, r0.y, r1.xxyz
    mad r0.xyz, c9.xyww, r0.x, r0.yzww
    add r0.xyz, r0, c10.xyww
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    texld r1, c11.y, s2
    mad r0.xy, r0, r0.z, c5.x
    mul r0.zw, r0.xyxy, c5.xyyz
    mov r2.z, c11.z
    mul r2.xyw, r2.z, c13.xyzz
    frc r2.xyw, r2_abs
    cmp r2.xyw, c11.z, r2, -r2
    mul r2.xy, r2, c6
    frc r3.xy, r2
    add r2.xy, r2, -r3
    mad r2.xy, r2, c5.yzzw, r0.zwzw
    texld r3, r2, s3
    add r2.x, r2.z, c5.w
    mul r2.yz, r2.x, c13.xxyw
    frc r2.yz, r2_abs
    cmp r2.xy, r2.x, r2.yzzw, -r2.yzzw
    mul r2.xy, r2, c6
    frc r4.xy, r2
    add r2.xy, r2, -r4
    mad r0.zw, r2.xyxy, c5.xyyz, r0
    texld r4, r0.zwzw, s3
    lrp r5, r2.w, r4, r3
    dp4 r0.z, r1, r5
    mul r0.z, r0.z, c5.x
    texld r1, r0.z, s4
    mad r0.z, r0.z, r0.z, -r1.y
    mad r0.z, r0.z, c5.x, r1.y
    mov_sat r0.xy, r0
    texld r1, r0, s5
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0.z, r1.y, c0
    dp3 r0.w, r0, c13.w
    lrp_pp r1.xyz, c12.x, r0.w, r0
    add r0.xyz, r1, c6.z
    mov r0.w, c6.w
    mad_pp r0.xyz, c12.y, r0, r0.w
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    rsq_pp r0.y, r0.y
    rsq_pp r0.z, r0.z
    rcp_pp oC0.x, r0.x
    rcp_pp oC0.y, r0.y
    rcp_pp oC0.z, r0.z
    mov_pp oC0.w, c6.w

// approximately 73 instruction slots used (8 texture, 65 arithmetic)
